statements: UPDATE ContentTrends SET view_count = 1000, engagement_rate = 0.75 WHERE content_id = 12345;
UPDATE ContentTrends SET content_title = 'New Title', audience_age_group = '18-30', audience_gender = 'Female' WHERE content_id = 54321;
UPDATE ContentTrends SET engagement_rate = 0.75, view_count = view_count + 1000 WHERE content_id = 101;
UPDATE ContentTrends SET audience_location = 'New York', engagement_rate = 0.85 WHERE content_type = 'Article';
UPDATE content_trends SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE content_id = 101;
UPDATE audience_preferences SET age = 30, gender = 'Male', interests = 'Sports, Technology' WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE content_trends SET likes = likes + 1, shares = shares + 2 WHERE content_id = 12345;
UPDATE audience_preferences SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE Content_Trends SET likes = 100, views = views + 50 WHERE content_id = 123;
UPDATE Audience_Preferences SET gender = 'Male', location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE Content_Trends SET views = 1000, likes = 500 WHERE content_id = 123
UPDATE Audience_Preferences SET location = 'New York', interests = 'Technology, Travel' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE ContentPosts SET post_title = 'New Title', post_content = 'Updated Content' WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE AudienceFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great post!', feedback_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE feedback_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE ContentPosts SET post_content = 'Updated content for post 1', likes_count = 50 WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE AudienceFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great post!', feedback_date = '2022-01-20 10:30:00' WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE trend_analysis SET total_views = 500, average_rating = 4.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE audience_preferences SET likes = 100, dislikes = 20, content_type = 'Article' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE trend_analysis SET total_views = total_views + 100, average_rating = 4.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_mining SET processing_time = 30, results = 'Improved forecasting model' WHERE id = 3;
